text:
Version: SOAP-2.1, Xerces-J 1.3.1, Tomcat

Bug occured when running the samples.addressbook.GetAddress

java samples.addressbook.GetAddress 
http://localhost:8080/soap/servlet/rpcrouter "John B. Good"

Caught SOAPException (SOAP-ENV:Client): 
A 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/:Fault' element must contain 
a: 'faultcode' element.
creator: yzang@tonbu.com
czhao@commonvision.com
